result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua Allen Moore was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Defendant to provide a DNA sample and pay the DNA surcharge.
Court ordered defendant to pay all costs and surcharges by 12/23/2016. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.

Concurrent with: concurrent to any other sentence, with credit for 31 days, a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.
Court will consider motion for expungement if defendant pays the fine and costs and successfully completes the sentence and has no further violations of the law raising to the level of probable cause.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua Allen Moore

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
15RM056094  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
12-19-2015

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

Court sentences defendant to serve 31 days, concurrent to any other sentence, in the House of Correction with credit for 31 days, a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

Defendant to provide a DNA sample and pay the DNA surcharge.

Court ordered defendant to pay all costs and surcharges by 12/23/2016. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. 

The court dimisses THE DOMESTIC ABUSE ENHANCER.

Court will consider motion for expungement if defendant pays the fine and costs and successfully completes the sentence and has no further violations of the law raising to the level of probable cause. 

Filed;
-Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
-Pretrial Incarceration Credit.

Defendant Joshua Allen Moore in court with attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the information and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record. Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.

Attorney Francisco Araiza for Attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales in court, defendant Joshua Allen Moore not in court, in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for bail bond hearing. Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court.  For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Cindy B.  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Joshua Allen Moore in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Joshua Allen Moore in custody.  James W. Frisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 31.  Scheduling conference scheduled for December 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Discharge Summary Report received and filed.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($75.00) gj
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 75.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales in court prior to case being called.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Joshua Allen Moore in court with attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State has turned over an offer and discovery.  Defense requests a plea and sentencing date. Case adjourned to Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Pooint Program report dated October 16, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
15RM042093  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff: 09/14/2015
Court ordered all previous conditions to remain in effect. Defendant taken into custody.
Bail motion by defense regarding program violation argued and denied by the Court. Court ordered cash bail set. Defendant taken into custody.

Defendant Joshua Allen Moore in court with attorney Anne A. Devitt.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status of counsel. Attorney Anne A. Devitt will be leaving the public defender's office.

Defense counsel has received discovery and offer. Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 37.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Program report dated September 8, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

JusticePoint Pretrial Services Violation Report (positive drug test) received and filed. Defendant does not have counsel.  Court will address on the next court date.

Justice Point called back saying that the defendant has attorney Devitt assigned to his case.  Court decided to address the violation. Attorney Devitt however, is on vacation.  Court will as originally planned, address this on the next court date.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Violation Report received and filed.
Justice Point Program violation: Drug Test - Positive; received and filed. Court reviewed violation, defendant has no counsel. Will be addressed at next scheduled hearing.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Joshua Allen Moore in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant does not qualify for public defender representation.  Status of Counsel scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.
Court ordered defendant to be monitored by Drug Testing
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with: Cindy B.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Joshua Allen Moore in court with attorney Gregory A. Renden.  Defendant Joshua Allen Moore in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. 
Defendant entered a plea of not guilty. 

IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY DEFENDANT DOES  NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER  REPRESENTATION.    
Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua Allen Moore
Current: 3228 Sanctuary Drive, South Milwaukee, WI 53172 United States  (Effective: 06-23-2015)
Prior: 2435 East Denton Avenue, St. Francis, WI 53235
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
